mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYTRANS ( TRAN_ID, TITLE, TRANS_DATE, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, IS_SHARED, CATEGORY, TYPE, MEMO, USER_ID, GROUP_TRAN_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_MYTRANS.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{transDate}, #{originalAmount}, #{isShared}, #{category}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{userId}, #{groupTransId} )

INSERT INTO GROUPTRANS ( TRAN_ID, TITLE, TRANS_DATE, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, CATEGORY, TYPE, MEMO, GROUPB_ID, USER_ID, NICKNAME ) SELECT SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{transDate}, #{originalAmount}, #{category}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{groupBId}, #{userId}, (SELECT NICKNAME FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT TRAN_ID AS "transId", TITLE AS "title", TRANS_DATE AS "transDate", ORIGINAL_AMOUNT AS "originalAmount", CATEGORY AS "category", TYPE AS "type", MEMO AS "memo", USER_ID AS "userId", IS_SHARED AS "isShared", GROUP_TRAN_ID AS "groupTransId" FROM MYTRANS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY TRAN_ID DESC

SELECT G.TRAN_ID AS "transId", G.TITLE AS "title", G.TRANS_DATE AS "transDate", G.ORIGINAL_AMOUNT AS "originalAmount", G.CATEGORY AS "category", G.TYPE AS "type", G.MEMO AS "memo", G.GROUPB_ID AS "groupBId", U.NICKNAME AS "nickname" FROM GROUPTRANS G JOIN USERS U ON (G.USER_ID = U.USER_ID) WHERE G.GROUPB_ID = #{groupBId} ORDER BY G.TRAN_ID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE GROUPTRANS SET TITLE = #{title}, TRANS_DATE = #{transDate}, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT = #{originalAmount}, CATEGORY = #{category} , TYPE = #{type}, MEMO = #{memo} WHERE TRAN_ID = #{transId}
mapper.select: SELECT TITLE AS "title", B_AMOUNT AS "budget", TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "startDate", TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "endDate" FROM GROUPBUDGET WHERE GROUPB_ID = #{groupId}
